entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
